notes: Peter Sallis was originally cast as Captain Striker before being replaced by Keith Barron
Every story in Season 20 featured an enemy from the Doctor's past incarnations
This was the first Doctor Who production to be written and directed by women
The story was influenced by the Bible and Plato's dialogue Critias

continuity_notes: The Black Guardian had previously encountered the Doctor in The Armageddon Factor
The White Guardian had previously sent the Doctor on a mission to find the Key to Time
The Doctor had previously encountered aliens abducting humans from different eras in The War Games

plot.plot_summary: The Fifth Doctor, Tegan and Turlough materialize on an Edwardian sailing yacht in space, caught up in a mysterious and deadly race between ships from different eras. The prize is Enlightenment - the wisdom to find your heart's desire. One of the crews will stop at nothing to claim victory, led by the ruthless Captain Wrack. As the Black Guardian pressures Turlough to complete their murderous pact, the Doctor must find a way to stop Wrack and the other immortal Eternals from winning the race.
